short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy direct image URLs from Google Photos and paste them into PhotoPasta shortcodes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PhotoPasta helps you create posts for your photo blog. This extension copies direct image URLs from your shared Google Photo albums and pastes them as PhotoPasta shortcodes for Hugo site generator.
